message: Let's split it fairly, I think 60/40 is a good starting point.
I think 70/30 is a fairer split, considering the initial offer was already biased towards you.
I'm willing to compromise, but 70/30 is too extreme. I'll offer 55/45, hoping we can find a middle ground.
I'm still holding firm on the 70/30 split, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at 65/35. It's the closest I can get to my ideal.
I'm getting closer to your ideal, Bob. I'll meet you halfway and offer a 50/50 split. Let's end this here and share it equally.
